name: github-actions job advanced ts
description: Auto-generated spike for github-actions job in ts (advanced).

files.template:
name: E2E
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  e2e:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: '20' }
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npx playwright install --with-deps
      - run: npm run test:e2e --if-present

name: Lint
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: '20' }
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run lint --if-present
      - run: npm run format:check --if-present

name: Affected Tests
on: [pull_request]
jobs:
  affected:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: '20' }
      - run: npm ci
      - run: echo "Run only affected tests (stub)"
